summary: Yet another fugly orc to add to your playthrough.
descriptionHtml:
Again I was lazy with the name and chose an orcish one I found on the WIki for Morrowind I think. Ahh and yes Orc's seem to get flak because well they are orcs and not really that attractive (vanilla). My vision was to change that. For this follower, she will use the Wet Skin as shown on the screens. I didn't overdo the stats this time so she should be somewhat even in combat but not too overpowered. I just hate that annoying (I'm dying) crawl on the ground. Enjoy this as I have creating it and don't forget to toss me some Kitty treats...
She will have an Orc Voice and in testing worked fine with the follower dialog without using Relationship Dialog Overhaul but if needed install it. 

Height: 1.0
Weight: 100
Essential
Marriageable 
Location ID: Morvunskar (coc morvunskar01)
As an orc no fancy magic and only skilled in ranged and melee combat
Custom armor was provided as a default armor instead of vanilla.
The main screen (1st and 2nd) reflects the default hair and any other just me screwing around.
Default armor is here: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65991/?tab=files
Will I ever update the description and make it fancier? Prolly
Will I ever stop uploading my creations? Prolly never.
Why do you upload so much? I like to create. Nothing more nothing less.
Will you stop being such a bad kitty? Prolly never.

Credits:
I use Fair Skin as a base and sometimes some others if I like them.
Many, many eyes but this time it was Eyes Of Beauty
Zillions of hairs but I chose KSHairs.
Armor in screens was provided by Pero Pero armor pack III
Screens were shot in Goma Pero Land III
ENB is Real Vision
Why are they lighting off fireworks on the 24th still? NO CLUE
author: Kittyness
